main.name: Laufey Guðnadóttir
main.bio: My love of graphic design started at an early age.  The family tradition of crafting our own Christmas cards is where it all started, having all the glitter and pens in the world, being able to do what I wanted, fired up passion for design and encouraged me to take every art class I could throughout my education. As I got older, I also got interested in photography. Photographing interesting buildings, landscape and environment has interested me for a long time, whereas photographing the northern lights is my favourite.
